languages.text: "Я познала одиннадцать смертей и воскрешений. Но истины не открылось. Стало... лишь больше вопросов. Где начинаюсь я и кончаюсь я? Неужели можно столь легко вырвать душу из дланей Неумирающего и возвратить в тело? Если смерть есть не начало, не конец, не путь... то что есть смерть?"

"I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"
languages.original_text: "Я познала одиннадцать смертей и воскрешений. Но истины не открылось. Стало... лишь больше вопросов. Где начинаюсь я и кончаюсь я? Неужели можно столь легко вырвать душу из дланей Неумирающего и возвратить в тело? Если смерть есть не начало, не конец, не путь... то что есть смерть?"

traits.locale_text: "I came to know eleven deaths and resurrections. But there was no truth to learn. All I found... was more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch the soul from the Undying One's hands and put it back in its body? If death is not the beginning, or the end, or the path... then what is death?"

"I came to know eleven deaths and resurrections. But there was no truth to learn. All I found... was more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch the soul from the Undying One's hands and put it back in its body? If death is not the beginning, or the end, or the path... then what is death?"

"I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers.... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the Way... then what is it?"

Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

languages.text: «He conocido once muertes y resurrecciones, pero la verdad me sigue eludiendo. La muerte no me ha aportado ninguna respuesta... solo más preguntas. ¿Cuál es mi comienzo y cuál mi final? ¿De verdad es tan sencillo arrebatar un alma de manos del Inmortal y devolverla a su cuerpo? Si la muerte no es el principio ni el final, si no es el hilo que nos guía... ¿qué es?».
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

traits.locale_text: «He conocido once muertes y resurrecciones, pero la verdad me sigue eludiendo. La muerte no me ha aportado ninguna respuesta... solo más preguntas. ¿Cuál es mi comienzo y cuál mi final? ¿De verdad es tan sencillo arrebatar un alma de manos del Inmortal y devolverla a su cuerpo? Si la muerte no es el principio ni el final, si no es el hilo que nos guía... ¿qué es?».

languages.text: 「私は11回死んで、11回生き返った。けれど、真実はいまだ私から逃れようとする。死は答えをもたらさない…ただ疑問が増えるのみ。私はどこで始まり、どこで終わる？不死の者の手から魂を奪って肉体に戻すというのは、本当にそんなに簡単なことなの？死が始まりでも終わりでもなく、私たちを導く糸ですらないとしたら…死とは何なの？」
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は11回死んで、11回生き返った。けれど、真実はいまだ私から逃れようとする。死は答えをもたらさない…ただ疑問が増えるのみ。私はどこで始まり、どこで終わる？不死の者の手から魂を奪って肉体に戻すというのは、本当にそんなに簡単なことなの？死が始まりでも終わりでもなく、私たちを導く糸ですらないとしたら…死とは何なの？」
「私は11回死んで、11回生き返った。けれど、真実はいまだ私から逃れようとする。死は答えをもたらさない…ただ疑問が増えるのみ。私はどこで始まり、どこで終わる？不死の者の手から魂を奪って肉体に戻すというのは、本当にそんなに簡単なことなの？死が始まりでも終わりでもなく、私たちを導く糸ですらないとしたら…死とは何なの？」

languages.text: “我经历了十一次死亡，十一次复活，但仍然没有找到真理。死亡并没有带来答案……只带来了更多问题。我该从哪里开始，又该在哪里结束？从不死之神的手中夺走灵魂，将它重新塞回肉体之中，这件事情真的那么轻而易举吗？如果死亡既不是开始，也不是结束……如果死亡根本不是指引我们的丝线……那它究竟是什么？”
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

traits.locale_text: “我经历了十一次死亡，十一次复活，但仍然没有找到真理。死亡并没有带来答案……只带来了更多问题。我该从哪里开始，又该在哪里结束？从不死之神的手中夺走灵魂，将它重新塞回肉体之中，这件事情真的那么轻而易举吗？如果死亡既不是开始，也不是结束……如果死亡根本不是指引我们的丝线……那它究竟是什么？”

languages.text: "Ich hab elf Tode und Wiederbelebungen erlebt. Aber die Wahrheit entgleitet mir noch immer. Der Tod hat keine Antworten gebracht ... nur weitere Fragen. Wo ist mein Anfang, und wo ist mein Ende? Ist es wirklich so einfach, der Hand des Todlosen eine Seele zu entreißen und in ihren Körper zurückzubringen? Wenn der Tod nicht Anfang oder Ende ist, wenn er nicht der Faden ist, der uns leitet ... was ist er dann?"
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

Wenn der Tod nicht Anfang oder Ende ist, wenn er nicht der Faden ist, der uns leitet ... was ist er dann?"

languages.text: « J'en suis passée par onze morts et autant de résurrections successives, mais la vérité m'échappe encore et toujours. La mort ne m'a apporté aucune réponse... seulement davantage de questions. Où est-ce que je commence et où est-ce que je finis ? Est-ce vraiment si facile que cela d'arracher une âme aux mains de l'Immortel et de la renvoyer dans son corps ? Si la mort n'est ni le début ni la fin, et si ce n'est pas non plus le fil qui nous guide... alors, qu'est-ce que c'est ? »
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"

languages.text: "On bir kez ölüp dirildim. Ancak hakikate yine de ulaşamadım. Ölümden cevap çıkmadı... Sadece daha fazla soru çıktı. Benim başım nerede, sonum nerede? Ölmeyen'in elinden ruh çalıp bedenine geri koymak gerçekten bu kadar basit mi? Bu işin ne sonu ne de başı ölüm değilse, bize yol gösteren iplik ölüm değilse... O hâlde nedir?"
languages.original_text: "I have known eleven deaths and resurrections. But the truth still eludes me. Death brought no answers... only more questions. Where do I begin and where do I end? Is it really so easy to snatch a soul from the hands of the Undying One and return it to its body? If death is not the beginning or the end, if it is not the thread that guides us... then what is it?"
